org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.logical.impl
Class LogicalFileBrowserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.task.impl.AbstractTaskSubmissionService
      org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.impl.AbstractFileTaskService
          org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.logical.impl.LogicalFileBrowserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileBrowserService, FileTaskService, LogicalFileBrowserService, org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.PortletService, org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.spi.PortletServiceProvider, TaskSubmissionService
public class LogicalFileBrowserServiceImpl
extends AbstractFileTaskService
implements LogicalFileBrowserService

Implements a file browser service that delegates tasks to other file browser services.
